concept.description: Labels all classes in .impl packages as IMPL.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:PACKAGE)-[:CONTAINS*]->(t:TYPE) WHERE p.FQN =~ {packageExpression} SET t:IMPL RETURN t AS implementationCLass

concept.description: Label all classes in .api packages as API.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:PACKAGE)-[:CONTAINS*]->(t:TYPE) WHERE p.FQN =~ {packageExpression} SET t:API RETURN t AS apiClass

constraint.description: API classes must not have dependencies to implementation classes.
constraint.cypher: MATCH p=shortestPath((a:TYPE)-[:DECLARES|DEPENDS_ON*]->(i:TYPE)) WHERE a:API AND i:IMPL RETURN extract(t in nodes(p) | t.FQN) as Path ORDER BY length(p) DESC
